solution_line_template: The sales of the carrot is {broccoli_sales} x {carrot_multiplier} = $<<{broccoli_sales}*{carrot_multiplier}={carrot_sales}>>{carrot_sales}
Half the sales of carrot is ${carrot_sales} / {half_divisor} = $<<{carrot_sales}/{half_divisor}={half_carrot_sales}>>{half_carrot_sales}.
So, the sales of the spinach is ${half_carrot_sales} + ${spinach_additional_amount} = <<{half_carrot_sales}+{spinach_additional_amount}={spinach_sales}>>{spinach_sales}

The total sales of the broccolis, carrots, spinach is ${broccoli_sales} + ${carrot_sales} + ${spinach_sales} =$<<{broccoli_sales}+{carrot_sales}+{spinach_sales}={total_sales_other_vegetables}>>{total_sales_other_vegetables}.
